KeyTable.Comment: Immediate action processing on key 0 Press.
Action processing on release of key 1, TimeOutList value equal/greater than hold time before the release, hold time closest to TimeOutList, if multiple entries found.
Action processing on release of key 1, TimeOutList value equal/greater than hold time before the release, hold time closest to TimeOutList, if multiple entries found.
Action processing on release of key 1, TimeOutList value equal/greater than hold time before the release, hold time closest to TimeOutList, if multiple entries found.
Single buttone press and hold: Press and hold key 3 with hold time mentioned in TimeOutList.
MultiButton support: Press and hold key 1 and 3 with hold time mentioned in TimeOutList.
MultiButton support: Press and hold key 1 and 3 with hold time mentioned in TimeOutList.
Repetitive action: Press and hold key 4 with hold time mentioned in TimeOutList[0] to trigger action, repetitive actions are triggered after every TimeOutList[1] if the button is still pressed.
Burst Key support: Release of key 5 (2 times) in time between key releases less than TimeOutList value between  to trigger action
Burst Key support: Release of key 5 (3 times) in time between key releases less than TimeOutList value between  to trigger action
